item.title: CVE-2024-38182|2024-07-31T23:00:11.224Z -- microsoft -- dynamics%20365%20field%20service%20%28on-premises%29%20v7%20series
item.description: Weak authentication in Microsoft Dynamics 365 allows an unauthenticated attacker to elevate privileges over a network.
